login.title: Welcome Back
login.description: Enter your email and password to access your account

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.successDescription: We've sent a password reset link to
forgotPassword.checkSpam: If you don't see the email in your inbox, please check your spam folder.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least {{count}} characters long.
errors.failedToSend: Failed to send reset email. Please try again.
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.failedToReset: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
errors.resetLinkExpired: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
